participant_1.background:
I took my children to the mountains to see the fall colors.
i make 35 million a year.
Jasper may be jealous of my new Chevy.
I want to be reincarnated as a person who can live a life of leisure and focus on my passion for drawing.
i once drove a car ! my friend told me what to do while i drove.

it s important for my instagram posts to look like i m having fun.

content.text: Hey how are you? I just went to the mountains with my kids to see the fall colors.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to watch CSI to relax and I have a pug.
I once drove a car, but my friend told me what to do while I drove. What is your dream?
I would like to learn how to fly an airplane and I like eating at the diner down the street because it reminds me of my childhood.
I make 35 million a year and I want to be reincarnated as a person who can live a life of leisure and focus on my passion for drawing.
Wow, that is a lot of money! I like to go to the Ufc fights and I want to make my Instagram posts look like I am having fun.
I think it's important to be real on social media, but I also like to watch the UFC fights.
Yeah, I like to live my life to the fullest and I think it's important to be true to yourself.
I agree! I think it's important to be happy with who you are and what you do.
Me too! I think it's important to be positive and to enjoy life.
I think so too! I try to live my life to the fullest and I try to make the most of every opportunity.
